Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
org.brick_breaker.sprites.Sprite
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Borders, Brick, MovingSprite
public abstract class Sprite extends Object implements Serializable
Clase que representa un sprite en el juego.
See Also:
